title: Photograph, "Album: Sink with Single Drainboard", 1929–40
description: The present photograph features a single drainboard sink fabricated of Monel (tm) metal with a faucet-cum-soap-dish mounted on the backsplash behind the basin. The photographic lighting design achieves a pattern of light and shadow playing on the metallic surfaces.

tombstone.epitaph:
Photograph, "Album: Sink with Single Drainboard", 1929–40.
1929–40. 16.6 x 25.9 cm (6 1/2 x 9 1/2 in.). Gift of Ellen Gustav Jensen. 1956-47-84-g.
